CustomField.description: OrgWideEmailAddress Id used as the From address for portal emails (welcome, password reset).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Paste the 18-character Id of an Org-Wide Email Address to use as the From address for portal emails (welcome, password reset). Find it under Setup > Org-Wide Email Addresses. Leave blank to use the default.
CustomField.label: Email On Behalf Of
